The goal is to present our listings in an appealing manner.

jobs.title: International Job Seeker & Visa Expert

jobs.title: Job Application Submissions Assistance -- 2

jobs.job_description: **Freelance Medical Coder Job Posting** **Title:** Freelance Medical Coder for USA-based Projects **Description:** We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Freelance Medical Coder to support our medical documentation and coding projects for USA-based healthcare clients. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience with medical coding standards and EHR systems, ensuring accurate and compliant coding practices. **Responsibilities:** - Review and analyze patient medical records to assign appropriate diagnostic (ICD-10-CM), procedural (CPT), and HCPCS codes. - Ensure compliance with legal regulations, HIPAA standards, and healthcare reimbursement guidelines. - Work collaboratively with healthcare providers and billing teams to resolve coding issues.

jobs.title: Comprehensive Job Portal Development
jobs.job_description: FEATURES FOR JOB PORTAL (FRONT END & BACK END) FRONT END PAGES Home: Introduction to the job portal, & indexing of internal pages. Job Search: A page where job seekers can search for jobs through filters like location, job title, job keywords industry, etc. Job Details: A page that displays detailed information about all jobs which have been posted from back end by all the companies. Job Application: A page where job seekers can apply for a job by uploading their resume and cover letter. Employers Directory: A page that lists all registered employers on the platform & from same page employer can create a profile of them. Job Posting: A page where employers can post new job openings. About Us: A page that provides information about the job portal.
